message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $18000. I know it's a valuable item, and I believe this price reflects its worth. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I would like to propose a lower price of $16000. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $16000 is a bit low for me. I'm willing to come down to $17000.  Let's meet halfway on this, I'm confident we can make this work.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with a price of $16500. I hope this brings us closer to reaching an agreement.
